name: Sun Shooter (Wong Wong)
description:
You will truly never win this game!

This is not a slogan, you can never win because of the logical design.

But how? This is where this game interesting at.

So try to find out the cause!

=======================================

Hi guys I am Wong Wong.

16 yrs old game developer in Taiwan.

Hope you enjoy my game and take care of yourself from the coronavirus.

Cheers.
